short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Carbon Debt is a plugin to empower consumers to make basic payments against debt to the planet for activities which create carbon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Carbon Debt is a plugin to empower consumers to make basic payments against debt to the planet for activities which create carbon. When we burn fossil fuels, cut down trees, or even utilize a tremendous amount of water, we are borrowing from the planet, and creating debt. Whether you are shipping a product, taking a flight, or utilizing something without a sustainable alternative, we offer users the ability to pay to plant trees, not merely as an offset, but a payment towards a global debt challenge. Help us get back into balance by paying your carbon debt, and planting more trees today!
